name: Mediocre Misadventures of Just Simon 3 Dissonance of Balance
name_original: Mediocre Misadventures of Just Simon 3 Dissonance of Balance
description: Our confused hero, sitting home felt new threat to the world, without doubts J.S once again took his sword Dreamer and went into another misadventure, to prevent a catastrophe, in this game you will encounter with the characters from another miscellaneous games like Batter from OFF, Sabitsuki from .Flow, Himuro Hitoshi from Paranormal Syndrome Trilogy, Fifteen from Katana Zero and Soutarou from Mikan Muzou, help to confused hero finish his third quest.
